data.title: Read Reviews for King Lear, Starring Anthony Hopkins and Emma Thompson
data.meta_description: The Richard Eyre-helmed adaptation will be available to stream on Amazon Prime beginning September 28.
data.text:
Amazon Prime Video will release its new film adaptation of William Shakespeare's King Lear, directed by Richard Eyre and co-produced with the BBC, September 28. The film is set in the fictional present and stars Oscar winner Anthony Hopkins as the infamous monarch; Emma Thompson, Emily Watson, and Florence Pugh play his daughtersâ€”Goneril, Regan, and Cordelia, respectively.

Read reviews for King Lear below. Check back for updates.

The Guardian (Sam Wollaston)

The Hollywood Reporter (Daniel Fienberg)

Rounding out the cast of King Lear are Jim Broadbent, who plays the Earl of Gloucester, Jim Carter as the Earl of Kent, Tobias Menzies as the Duke of Cornwall, John Macmillan as Edmund, Anthony Calf as the Duke of Albany, Simon Manyonda as the Duke of Burgundy, and Chukwudi Iwuji, recently seen on the Delacorte Theater stage as Othello, as the King of France.
